p: The real income and population data are gathered from the World Bank’s World Development Indicators (WDI), whereas CO2 emissions data is sourced from the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) database. Lastly, the final energy consumption data and fossil fuel energy consumption data are retrieved from the International Energy Agency (IEA) database. The research period covers the years from 1990 to 2017, and the annual data are consistent with international standards.
